statements: DELETE FROM RiskIndicators WHERE id = 1 AND status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM RiskIndicators WHERE current_value < 100 OR target_value > 150;
DELETE FROM RiskIndicators WHERE risk_value > 100.50 AND risk_name = 'Market Risk';
DELETE FROM DashboardViews WHERE view_type = 'Bar Chart' AND created_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM risk_dashboard WHERE risk_indicator = 'credit score' AND indicator_value < 600;
DELETE FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 5 AND display_order = 2;
DELETE FROM metric_assignment WHERE user_id = 100 AND metric_id = 2;
